com.scooterframework.cache
Class CacheProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.scooterframework.admin.Plugin
      com.scooterframework.cache.CacheProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cache
public abstract class CacheProvider
extends Plugin
implements Cache

CacheProvider class defines common methods of a cache provider. CacheProvier acts as a singleton instance if it is created by CacheObjectFactory class.

public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String key)
Returns object from cache based on key.

Specified by:
get in interface Cache
Returns:
the value to which this cache maps the specified key, or null if the cache contains no mapping for this key.

getObject

protected abstract java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.String key)
Retrieves object from cache based on key. The key here is a combination of namespace and key from request. Subclass must implement this method.

Parameters:
key -
Returns:
object

putObject

protected abstract boolean putObject(java.lang.String key,
                                     java.lang.Object value)
Puts object into cache based on key. The key here is a combination of namespace and key from request. Subclass must implement this method.

Parameters:
key - the key of the corresponding value
value - the object to be cached
Returns:
true if successfully stored

removeObject

protected abstract boolean removeObject(java.lang.String key)
Removes object from cache based on key. The key here is a combination of namespace and key from request. Subclass must implement this method.

key -
Returns:
object

Removes all objects from cache
